001/**  
002 * This controller provides functionality for adding an employee
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import javafx.fxml.FXML;
008import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
009import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
010import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
011import javafx.scene.Node;
012import javafx.scene.Parent;
013import javafx.scene.Scene;
014import javafx.stage.Stage;
015import javafx.event.Event;
016import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
017import src.database.db_connect;
018import java.sql.*;
019
020import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
021import static src.controller.useful_functions.set_current_name;
022import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
023
024import java.io.File;
025import java.io.IOException;
026
027import src.model.employee;
028
029/** 
030 * This class provides functionality for adding an employee
031*/
032public class new_employee_controller {
033
034    /** Text field for the name of the employee to be added */
035    @FXML
036    private TextField full_name_field;
037
038    /** Text field for the position of the employee to be added */
039    @FXML
040    private TextField position_field;
041
042    /** Text field for the salary of the employee to be added */
043    @FXML
044    private TextField salary_field;
045
046    /** Text field for the supervisor name of the employee to be added */
047    @FXML
048    private TextField reporting_field;
049
050    /**
051     * This function attempts to add the employee after the user hits enter
052     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called 
053     */
054    @FXML //pressing enter after typing full name and position
055    private void handle_enter(ActionEvent event) {
056        String name = full_name_field.getText() == null ? "" : full_name_field.getText().trim();
057        String pos  = position_field.getText()  == null ? "" : position_field.getText().trim();
058        String salary  = salary_field.getText()  == null ? "" : salary_field.getText().trim();
059        String reporting  = reporting_field.getText()  == null ? "" : reporting_field.getText().trim();
060
061        // error handling if there is no entry
062        if (name.isEmpty() || pos.isEmpty() || reporting.isEmpty() || salary.isEmpty()) {
063            return;
064        }
065
066        employee employee = new employee(name, pos, Float.parseFloat(salary), reporting);
067
068        // commit new employee to the database
069        try (Connection conn = db_connect.getConnection()) {
070            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
071
072            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT employeename FROM employee WHERE employeename = ?");
073            checkStmt.setString(1, employee.getEmployeeName());
074 
075            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
076            if (rs.next()) {
077                System.out.println("Employee already exists");
078            }
079            else {
080                PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO employee (employeename, position, salary, reporting) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING employeeid");
081                insertStmt.setString(1, employee.getEmployeeName());
082                insertStmt.setString(2, employee.getPosition());
083                insertStmt.setFloat(3, employee.getSalary());
084                insertStmt.setString(4, employee.getReporting());
085
086                ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
087                
088                if (rs1.next()) {
089                  System.out.println("New employee added sucessfully");
090                }
091                else{
092                    System.out.println("Could not add new employee");
093                }
094            }
095
096            conn.commit();
097            System.out.println("Employee committed successfully!");
098        }
099        catch (SQLException e) {
100            e.printStackTrace();
101        }
102    }
103
104
105
106    /**
107     * This function switches back to the main employee data page
108     * @param event - Input trigger which calls the function after the back button is clicked
109     */
110    @FXML
111    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
112        switch_scene("GUI/employee_data.fxml", event);
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * This function clears all the text fields when this page opens
117     */
118    @FXML
119    public void initialize() {
120        // If the page ever re-opens with old text, clear it here
121        if (full_name_field != null) full_name_field.clear();
122        if (position_field  != null) position_field.clear();
123        if (salary_field  != null) salary_field.clear();
124        if (reporting_field  != null) reporting_field.clear();
125    }
126}
